Type.Name: EventDND
Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: The for the current DND operation.
Docs.value: The Gdk.DragContext for the current DND operation.

Docs.summary: The time of the event in milliseconds.
Docs.value: The time of the event in milliseconds.

Docs.summary: The x coordinate of the pointer relative to the root of the screen, only set for GDK_DRAG_MOTION and GDK_DROP_START (Find C# references for these).
Docs.value: The x coordinate of the pointer relative to the root of the screen, only set for GDK_DRAG_MOTION and GDK_DROP_START (Find C# references for these).

Docs.summary: The y coordinate of the pointer relative to the root of the screen, only set for GDK_DRAG_MOTION and GDK_DROP_START (Find C# references for these).
Docs.value: The y coordinate of the pointer relative to the root of the screen, only set for GDK_DRAG_MOTION and GDK_DROP_START (Find C# references for these).

Docs.remarks: This constructor is internal and should not be used.
